00243 namespace {
00245         struct MyTxtStream : public QTextStream
00246         {
00247             MyTxtStream(QString *s) : QTextStream(s, QIODevice::ReadOnly), str(*s) {}
00248             const QString & str;
00249         };
00250         template <typename T> MyTxtStream & operator>>(MyTxtStream &s, T & t)
00251             {
00252                 static_cast<QTextStream &>(s) >> t;
00253                 return s; 
00254             }
00255         template <> MyTxtStream & operator>>(MyTxtStream &s, bool & b) {
00256             if (!QString::compare(s.str, "true", Qt::CaseInsensitive)) b = true;
00257             else if (!QString::compare(s.str, "false", Qt::CaseInsensitive)) b = false;
00258             else {
00259                 int i;
00260                 static_cast<QTextStream &>(s) >> i;
00261                 b = i;
00262             }
00263             return s;
00264         }
00265 }

00267 // templatized functions for reading parameters
00268 template <typename T> 
00269 bool StimPlugin::getParam(const QString & name, T & out) const
00270 {        
00271         QMutexLocker l(&mut);
00272         StimParams::const_iterator it;
00273         for (it = params.begin(); it != params.end(); ++it)
00274             if (QString::compare(it.key(), name, Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0)
00275                 break;
00276 
00277         if (it != params.end()) { // found it!
00278             //if (it->canConvert<T>()) { out = it->value<T>(); return true; }
00279             //else { // fallback to ghetto method
00280                 QString s(it->toString());
00281                 MyTxtStream txt(&s);
00282                 T tmp;
00283                 if ( (txt >> tmp).status() == 0 ) {
00284                     out = tmp;
00285                     return true;
00286                 }
00287                 //}
00288         }
00289         return false;        
00290 }
